siteQueries.name: Columbus (Original)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '01' AND status = 'O'

siteQueries.name: Addison (Original)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '02' AND status = 'O'

siteQueries.name: Lake City (Original)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '03' AND status = 'O'

siteQueries.name: Columbus (Alt 1)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '1' AND status = 'O'

siteQueries.name: Addison (Alt 1)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '2' AND status = 'O'

siteQueries.name: Lake City (Alt 1)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '3' AND status = 'O'

siteQueries.name: Columbus (Alt 2)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '01' AND completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Addison (Alt 2)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '02' AND completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Lake City (Alt 2)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE location_id = '03' AND completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Columbus (Alt 3)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.location_mst l ON h.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.location_desc LIKE '%Columbus%' AND h.completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Addison (Alt 3)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.location_mst l ON h.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.location_desc LIKE '%Addison%' AND h.completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Lake City (Alt 3)
siteQueries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.location_mst l ON h.location_id = l.location_id WHERE l.location_desc LIKE '%Lake City%' AND h.completed = 'N'

siteQueries.name: Columbus Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '01' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Addison Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.location_id = '02' AND h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Total Sales
siteQueries.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

siteQueries.name: Lake City Sales (Calculated)
siteQueries.query: Calculated as Total Sales - (Columbus Sales + Addison Sales)
